channel.title: Need help with setting mods and admins
channel.description: ok i got testscape. (it will be spyroscape when im done. idk when it will be realeased) :| and i go into characters and get on my acc.'s file and change the player rights to 3. (thats an admin with a gold crown) :D and when i log in im not an admin and when i check on the acc's file the rights went back to 0. :confused: and it repetes... what can i do to fix this? :confused:

item.title: Need help with setting mods and admins

item.description:
@Ultimacool2 wrote:

Did you log out?

item.title: Need help with setting mods and admins

ok i got testscape. (it will be spyroscape when im done. idk when it will be realeased)
and i go into characters and get on my acc.'s file and change the player rights to 3. (thats an admin with a gold crown)
and when i log in im not an admin and when i check on the acc’s file the rights went back to 0.
and it repetes…
what can i do to fix this?
